Reviews.Title: Samsung Wave 2
Reviews.Author: George Wey
Reviews.Content: This Samsung Wave 2 is a Dual band 3G phone, Quad Band 2G phone. Use it for traveling, just insert a local sim card and your ready to go. Uses BADA v1.2, but I still prefer Android. Good phone only because your not limited to what country you can use it in.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Ninam69
Reviews.Content: Samsung Wave2.Excellent phone, beautiful, very fast!Bright colors, on the sun it is not badly visible the display.Well works, the battery long keeps.It is easy to use.Here has bought a cover for Wave2, glass isn't scratched.I am happy!

Reviews.Title: this is the best phone I used since my first siemens
Reviews.Author: Chadi
Reviews.Content: very stable. very fast. very reliable. the only problem is u don't find a lot of apps for bada and the system upgrade is not frequent

Reviews.Title: samsung wave ll
Reviews.Author: peter
Reviews.Content: Phone is a good buy. The 1gb pross. makes this phone quick while surfing. Great reception, The screen has good res. The camera and video work better then stand alone units, Audio sounds great with included ear buds, audio through the phone speaker isnt that great though.Only flaw so far

Reviews.Title: Not for USA
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: Phone is excellent,good camera and strong battery ,very fast,system BADA works correctly. Samsunng Wave 2 doesn't have support for 3G in USA :(

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: Cintia
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent!! It is really fast and easy to handle. And the FGS Trading is the best seller. They are very obliging!!

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G Network HSDPA 900 / 2100
Display Type Super Clear LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size 480 x 800 pixels, 3.7 inches - Scratch-resistant oleophobic surface
GPRS Class 10 (4+1/3+2 slots), 32 - 48 kbps EDGE Class 10, 236.8 kbps 3G HSDPA 3.6 Mbps, HSUPA, 2 Mbps WLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n Bluetooth Yes
Camera Primary 5 MP, 2592 x 1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash, check quality
OS Bada OS 1.2 CPU ARM Cortex A8 1GHz processor, Stereo FM radio with RDS, FM recording
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S8530 WAVE II Unlocked QuadBand GSM SmartPhone with 5 MP Camera, GPS, and MicroSD Slot - No Warranty - Ebony Gray
